named-query.name: SdmlControlSettingInfo.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SdmlControlSettingInfo a ORDER BY a.applicationId

named-query.name: SdmlControlSettingInfo.findByVersion
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SdmlControlSettingInfo a WHERE a.version = :version ORDER BY a.applicationId

named-query.name: SdmlControlSettingInfo.findByFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SdmlControlSettingInfo a WHERE a.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.applicationId

named-query.name: SdmlControlSettingInfo.findByMonitorId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SdmlControlSettingInfo a JOIN SdmlControlMonitorRelation b ON b.id.applicationId = a.applicationId WHERE b.id.monitorId = :monitorId

named-query.name: SdmlControlMonitorRelation.findByApplicationId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SdmlControlMonitorRelation a WHERE a.id.applicationId = :applicationId ORDER BY a.id.monitorId

named-query.name: SdmlControlMonitorRelation.findByApplicationIdAndFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SdmlControlMonitorRelation a WHERE a.id.applicationId = :applicationId AND a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.monitorId

named-query.name: SdmlControlStatus.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SdmlControlStatus a ORDER BY a.id.applicationId

named-query.name: SdmlControlStatus.deleteByApplicationId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM SdmlControlStatus a WHERE a.id.applicationId = :applicationId

named-query.name: SdmlInitializeData.findByApplicationIdAndFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SdmlInitializeData a WHERE a.id.applicationId = :applicationId AND a.id.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.id.key

named-query.name: SdmlInitializeData.deleteByApplicationId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM SdmlInitializeData a WHERE a.id.applicationId = :applicationId

named-query.name: SdmlInitializeData.deleteByApplicationIdAndFacilityId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM SdmlInitializeData a WHERE a.id.applicationId = :applicationId AND a.id.facilityId = :facilityId

named-query.name: SdmlMonitorTypeMasterInfo.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SdmlMonitorTypeMasterInfo a ORDER BY a.id.sdmlMonitorTypeId

named-query.name: SdmlMonitorTypeMasterInfo.findByPluginId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SdmlMonitorTypeMasterInfo a WHERE a.pluginId LIKE :pluginId ORDER BY a.id.sdmlMonitorTypeId

named-query.name: SdmlMonitorTypeMasterInfo.findByPluginIdNot
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM SdmlMonitorTypeMasterInfo a WHERE a.pluginId NOT LIKE :pluginId ORDER BY a.id.sdmlMonitorTypeId
